text: The Legend of Billie Jean is a 1985 American drama movie directed by Matthew Robbins and starring Helen Slater, Peter Coyote, Christian Slater, Keith Gordon, Dean Stockwell, Yeardley Smith. It was distributed by Tri-Star Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1985 drama movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies directed by Matthew Robbins Category:Movies about outlaws
title: The Legend of Billie Jean
